org.nd4j.linalg.jcublas.context

Class ContextHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.jcublas.context.ContextHolder

  • public class ContextHolder
extends java.lang.Object
    A multithreaded version derived from the cuda launcher util by the authors of jcuda. This class handles managing cuda contexts across multiple devices and threads.
    Author:
    Adam Gibson
